Interface Pipeline

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, VulkanFreeable, VulkanObject
All Known Implementing Classes:
ComputePipeline, GraphicsPipeline, RayTracePipeline
public interface Pipeline extends VulkanFreeable, VulkanObject
Pipelines are the way of doing work on the GPU, either by a GraphicsPipeline, a RayTracePipeline, or a ComputePipeline.
See Also:
  • Pipelines :: Vulkan Documentation Project

  • Method Details

    • of

      static Pipeline of(VulkanInstance.VirtualDevice device, PipelineLayout layout, long address, int bindPoint)
      Creates a new Pipeline with the specified address. Calling VulkanFreeable.free() on this instance will do nothing.
      Parameters:
      device - the device
      layout - the layout
      address - the address
      bindPoint - the bindPoint
      Returns:
      the created Pipeline
